ReportText: Exam: XR CHEST AP OR PA ONLY INDICATION: Respiratory distress or failure requiring intubation with or without ventilator support. COMPARISON: 11/09/00. TECHNIQUE: AP semi-supine view of the chest is obtained. FINDINGS: Stable support devices. Stable heart size and small effusions. Slightly decreased lung volumes with decreased atelectasis. No pneumothorax or other acute interval complication. Remaining visible anatomy stable. IMPRESSION: Slightly decreased lung volumes.
